tool_description: World University Search and Rankings with Filter By Regions, Country, Subject, Study level and pagination.
title: World University Search and Rankings

api_list.name: All World University List
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all University list from all over the world with pagination.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-university-search-and-rankings.p.rapidapi.com/search"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-university-search-and-rankings.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search World University by Country ID
api_list.description: This endpoint will return a World University list with Filter By Country ID and pagination.

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: Country parameters from Region List of country ID

api_list.name: All Study Level List

api_list.name: Search Region List by country name
api_list.description: This endpoint will return a Region List with filter by country name.

required_parameters.name: countryName
required_parameters.description: Country name parameters from Region List of country name

api_list.name: Search Region List by country ID
api_list.description: This endpoint will return a Region List with filter by country ID.

required_parameters.name: countryId
required_parameters.description: Country ID parameters from Region List of country ID

api_list.name: Search Region List by name
api_list.description: This endpoint will return a Region List with filter by name.

api_list.name: All Region List
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all Region List.

api_list.name: Search World University by Subjects ID
api_list.description: This endpoint will return a World University list with Filter By Subjects ID and pagination.

required_parameters.name: subjects
required_parameters.description: Subjects parameters from Subjects List of ID

api_list.name: Search World University by Region ID
api_list.description: This endpoint will return a World University list with Filter By Region ID and pagination.

required_parameters.name: region
required_parameters.description: Region parameters from Region List of ID

api_list.name: Search Region List by ID
api_list.description: This endpoint will return a Region List with filter by ID.

api_list.name: Search World University by University ID
api_list.description: This endpoint will return a World University list with filter by University ID and pagination.

required_parameters.name: university
required_parameters.description: University parameters from University List of nid

api_list.name: Search World University by Study level ID
api_list.description: This endpoint will return a World University list with filter includes by Study level ID and pagination.

required_parameters.name: study_level
required_parameters.description: Study level parameters from Study Level List of ID, these parameters can filter more than 1 level ex. study_level=1,2
